definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Sri Mulyani Indrawati is Managing Director of the World Bank Group and a former finance minister of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行集團常務董事，曾任印尼財政部長。

sentences.english: Tarrin endorses reform measures in the United States set out by Treasury Secretary Tim Geithner.
sentences.chinese: 他林支持美國財政部長蓋特納制定的改革措施。

sentences.english: In Greece, the prime minister reshuffled his Cabinet and replaced his finance minister.
sentences.chinese: 在希臘，英國首相改組內閣和更換他的財政部長。

sentences.english: Treasury Secretary Timothy Geithner has been released from the hospital after undergoing treatment for a kidney stone.
sentences.chinese: 財政部長蓋特納因腎結石接受治療後出院了。

sentences.english: Mr Solbes, too, will not be a simple finance minister.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，索爾韋斯先生也不會是個簡單的財政部長。

sentences.english: The role of Secretary of the Treasury was critical in the early days of the new nation.
sentences.chinese: 建國初期，財政部長的角色是至關重要的。

sentences.english: He is to be replaced by the respected finance minister, Palaniappan Chidambaram.
sentences.chinese: 他的職務將被受到尊重的財政部長奇丹巴拉姆所取代。

sentences.english: Another, Shamsoddin Hosseini, the finance minister, narrowly survived a bid to have him impeached.
sentences.chinese: 另一位盟友，伊朗經濟財政部長侯賽尼也險遭彈劾。

sentences.english: The finance ministers at the Plaza Accord recognized that reality.
sentences.chinese: 廣長協定的財政部長們認識到了這一現實。

sentences.english: The finance ministry predicts diamond revenues will fall by 50 per cent. (Photo: Greg Marinovich)
sentences.chinese: 財政部長預測鑽石稅收將會下降50%。

sentences.english: Ken Henry, the head of Australia’s Treasury, seems optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞財政部長肯恩亨利似乎十分樂觀。

sentences.english: The new council would consist of about 20 finance ministers.
sentences.chinese: 新的理事會將包括大約20名財政部長。

sentences.english: "Attention should be given to the fiscal deficit," China's finance minister, Xie Xuren, warned the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 中國財政部長謝旭人警告美國要注意財政赤字。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Minister of Finance Xie Xuren noted risks from local government guarantees too.
sentences.chinese: 財政部長謝旭人也提到了地方政府提供擔保的風險。

sentences.english: Congress would be abdicating its responsibility if it gave the Treasury secretary a blank cheque.
sentences.chinese: 如果給財政部長開出“空白支票”，國會就是在失職。

sentences.english: He said the market might not get much time to digest what finance ministers said.
sentences.chinese: 他說市場可能沒有很多時間來消化財政部長說的話。

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
governor (of a province or colony)/US state governor/premier (Australian states)
chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress
Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
